title: Managing offshore multi-use settings: Use of conceptual mapping to reduce uncertainty of co-locating seaweed aquaculture and wind farms
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 358

Author(s): Ryan O'Shea, Elisa Capuzzo, Victoria Hemming, Gretchen Grebe, Rick Stafford, Sander W.K. van den Burg, Daniel Wood, Gordon Watson, Victoria Wells, Teresa Johnson, Stefan Erbs, Jaap W. van Hal, Bas Binnerts, Alexandra M Collins, Caroline Howe
